snippet: Remodelista is aiming a new site, Gardenista, at those hankering for fresh possibilities for the patio and deck.
abstract: Home renovation and furnishings Web site Remodelista introduces Gardenista, a new site that offers gardening and decorating advice for city-dwellers who have access to a patio or deck.
lead_paragraph: Remodelista is aiming a new site, Gardenista, at those hankering for fresh possibilities for the patio and deck.

headline.seo: Gardenista Looks to Demystify the Backyard
